scripts.build: npm run build:happ && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/habits/workdir
scripts.start:precheck: npm run clean:sandbox && npm run start:local-services
scripts.start:electron: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc-spin -n $AGENTS ./workdir/habit_fract.happ --ui-path ../app/dist network -b http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.generate:dev: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f $VITE_ADMIN_PORT generate workdir/habit_fract.happ -a habit_fract network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.start:dev: npm run generate:dev; RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f $VITE_ADMIN_PORT run -l -p $VITE_APP_PORT
scripts.start:prod: RUST_LOG=warn WASM_LOG=debug echo "pass" | hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/habit_fract.happ --ui-path ../app/dist network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT
scripts.clean: npm run clean:sandbox; npm run clean:build && npm run clean:modules
scripts.clean:build: rimraf target; npm run clean:dnas; npm run clean:happ; exit 0
